page.title: 06 Post Office
page.content: At the Post Office they are having an extension built to make the shop bigger. The people who work there are Mr. Ron and Mrs. Pat Rutterford. They sell lots of groceries and food and they sell some nice little crafts. It is called a Post Office because you can buy stamps to put on your letters or parcels to send to your friends. Then you can post them in the letter box outside. They wanted to buy the Post Office because they wanted their own business. They are open from 8am.-1.15pm. & 2pm.-6pm. and are closed Wednesday afternoon and Sunday all day to have a rest. Mr. Rutterford's helper in the shop is Miss Sharon Booker. They live in the house next door and have a son called James who is 15.
